name: Invisible Man #2
description: With the flavors of cacao and plum, this drink from Steven Mercer of Clock Bar in San Francisco invokes the spirit of British plum pudding.
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 ounces white whiskey such as High West Silver Oat Whiskey
2 heavy dashes Fee Bros plum bitters

recipeInstructions.text: Fill cocktail shaker with ice. Add whiskey, creme de cacao, and bitters. Stir for thirty seconds, then strain into a coupe glass.
